description: Comprehensive internal tool for data management, editing, backups, and health checks.

features.name: Raw Data Editor (Completed)
features.details: Direct JSON editing for Weeks data with DB sync. Removed redundant Member editor.

features.name: Advanced Import/Export (Completed)
features.details: 3-step import flow (Select -> Preview -> Confirm). Auto-backup before applying. Batch API implemented to prevent rate limits.

features.name: Health Check (Completed)
features.details: Scan and fix data integrity issues. Factory reset with dummy data.

features.name: Data Consistency (Completed)
features.details: Fixed issue where loadFromDb overwrote imported data in Stats view.

known_issues: Netlify build limit exceeded - deployment paused until reset or upgrade.
